description: Complete product launch preparation by setting up marketing materials, training sales team, and finalizing regulatory submissions. Tasks include: 1) Finalize product label and packaging design (75%), 2) Conduct thorough risk assessment and mitigation plan (90%), and 3) Coordinate with manufacturing for timely production.

Develop and launch an employee engagement campaign to improve company culture, focusing on work-life balance, team building, and professional development. Milestones include: 1) Conduct employee survey (60%), 2) Create and roll out training programs (85%), and 3) Organize quarterly social events (95%).
